data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Last holiday, my friends and I went to the snow mountain for skiing. When we finally set our foot on the snow mountain, we were amazed by the gorgeous nature presented to us. Before attending the skiing class, I was worried that I could learn a new skill only in a couple of hours. To everyone's surprise, despite the fact that it was literally my first attempt at skiing, I picked it up rather quickly. After finishing the class, I was free to go on my own. I was then taught by my friends how to turn while keeping going, and again, I learned quickly. After that, my friends and I went around and around on the harder track, and we all had great fun. (127字)
data.referenceText: Describe what you did on your last holiday or vacation. Did you travel anywhere?
data.referenceTranslate: 描述一下你在上一个假期做了什么。你去哪儿旅行了吗?
